channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Northland Lifts PT on Hut 8 Mining (HUT) to $26 From $20, Keeps an Overweight Rating

Turkey says it will intervene against any attempt to divide Syria

WATCH: Badly wounded Ukrainian soldier perseveres with love of wife
item.description: A Ukrainian soldier lost his vision and needed three amputations after a Russian drone exploded right next to him last October.

item.title: How automakers are being affected by Trump's tariffs
item.description: A 25% tariff on vehicles and auto parts imported into the U.S. has hit automakers amid President Trump's push for global trade partners to reach deals...

item.title: 15 dead of malnutrition in Gaza in 24 hours, Hamas-run ministry says
item.description: Hospitals recorded the deaths, Gaza's Hamas-run Ministry of Health said Tuesday.

item.title: Things to know about the release of federal documents related to MLK’s assassination
item.description: Federal records related to the investigation into the assassination of the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. have been released.

item.title: American killed in Syria amid growing sectarian violence, State Department says
item.description: The U.S. State Department confirmed on Tuesday that a U.S. citizen was killed in Syria.

item.title: Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell to meet with Deputy AG, Bondi says
item.description: Attorney General Pam Bondi has released a statement from Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche announcing he anticipates meeting with Ghislaine Maxwell...

item.title: Lawyers for Kilmar Abrego Garcia request delayed jail release amid deportation threat
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia's lawyers have requested that a judge delay his jail release for 30 days amid the threat of deportation once he's released. CBS N...

item.title: A double organ donor and a teen innovator find purpose through giving
item.description: David Begnaud shares the stories of Brian Flynn, a rare double organ donor, and Rachel Bee, a teen who created a sweatshirt to help fellow patients.

item.title: Is there a grace period on credit card payments?
item.description: Think you have extra time to pay your credit card? You might — but that's not true in every case. Here's why.

item.title: China blocks U.S. government worker and banker from leaving the country
item.description: China is refusing to let a U.S. Department of Commerce employee and a Wells Fargo banker leave the country, officials say.

item.title: WATCH: Spectacular powerboat crash off Monaco
item.description: Both pilots got out of their powerboats unharmed after a spectacular crash in E1 qualifying in Monaco.

item.title: Court overturns guilty verdict in 1979 Etan Patz case that drew attention to missing children
